segments.text: I'll participate in a quiz about the 29th Olympic Games in Beijing . It will be held tonight . Will you come ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure . What do you know about the Olympic Games on the past ? For example , do you know where and when the first Olympic Games were held in the ancient times ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It was held in 776 B . C . at Olympia . It also has a long history of more than 2700 years .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Haven't the Olympics been stopped for a long time ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , there were no games in 1916 , 1940 and 1944 , because of World War I and World War II .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I see . Look , do you know what that emblem means ? I've seen it so many times , but I don't know what it stands for .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , it's the Beijing 2008 Olympics ' Emblem . It's a Chinese seal , meaning that Chinese people warmly welcome the friends from all over the world .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I see . I believe there will be lots of foreigners coming to Beijing to watch the Games .
segments.speaker: S2
